title: reg_transform
description: Tool for performing various transformation operations on medical images including control point to deformation conversion, composition of transformations, and converting between deformation and displacement fields.

cpp2def_output_file.title: CPP to DEF Output File
cpp2def_output_file.description: File containing the CPP to DEF converted deformation field.

comp1_output_file.title: Composition 1 Output File
comp1_output_file.description: File containing the composed deformation field from two control point lattices.

comp2_output_file.title: Composition 2 Output File
comp2_output_file.description: File containing the composed deformation field from a deformation field and a control point lattice.

comp3_output_file.title: Composition 3 Output File
comp3_output_file.description: File containing the composed deformation field from two deformation fields.

def2disp_output_file.title: DEF to DISP Output File
def2disp_output_file.description: File containing the converted displacement field from a deformation field.

disp2def_output_file.title: DISP to DEF Output File
disp2def_output_file.description: File containing the converted deformation field from a displacement field.

upd_sform_output_file.title: Update Sform Output File
upd_sform_output_file.description: File containing the updated image with modified sform.

aff2def_output_file.title: AFF to DEF Output File
aff2def_output_file.description: File containing the composed deformation field from a non-rigid and an affine transformation.

inv_affine_output_file.title: Inverted Affine Output File
inv_affine_output_file.description: File containing the inverted affine matrix.

comp_aff_output_file.title: Composed Affine Output File
comp_aff_output_file.description: File containing the composed affine matrix.
